snippet: Along with the earlier arrival of spring, pollen is also making it into the air earlier, with more intensity, and sticking around for a longer period of time, studies show.
abstract: Along with the earlier arrival of spring, pollen is also making it into the air earlier, with more intensity, and sticking around for a longer period of time, studies show.

headline.main: Really? A Longer Allergy Season as Climate Warms
headline.print_headline: The Claim: Because of climate change, allergy seasons are longer.
